Text: NYSG ISDA NegotiationHere is the last email exchanged with Jason My notes below state the last status I had Attorney conference call with Jason Peters transfer arbitration and fall back finalized but Jason must check with Enron counsel Called Jason for status Susan Baily called to say their attorneys are backlogged Sara Shakelton and not pushing the IDSA remaining comments arbitration transfer until we are doing business again Emailed Jason for status since trading swaps Left voice mail message for Jason for status Contacted Sara for status left message Suggest we set up a conference call with our Attorney Janine Huber to finalize any remaining issues What is your availability this week Maria Forwarded by Maria R Gelnett on PM Maria R Gelnett To cc Subject ISDA Negotiation PM Jason In addition please consider d Removal of reference to confirm since using standard ISDA form jc Make it bilateral Thank you Forwarded by Maria R Gelnett on PM Maria R Gelnett AM To INTERNET cc Subject ISDA Negotiation Per my voice mail message Forwarded by Maria R Gelnett on AM Maria R Gelnett PM To cc Janine Subject ISDA Negotiation Susan Here is the proposed language Part g fifth line if any and the combined net worth of the Party and its Credit Support Provider is not materially diminished as a result thereof Part b k Commodity Options With respect to Transactions involving commodity options it is a producer processor or commercial user of or merchant handling the commodity which is the subject of the commodity option Transaction or the products or byproducts thereof and that it enters into the commodity option Transaction solely for purposes related to its business as such Part f i Negotiated Fallback provided that references to the fifth Business Day shall be to the first Business Day ii Fallback Reference Price iii No Fault Termination Here is NYSEGs original version of the Master and CSA It does not need to be considered at this point of negotiation See attached file MSTRnysegDOCSee attached file CREDITnysegrDOC ps They originally were sent email to Marie Heard on Please contact me to set up a time for our Attorneys to discuss arbitration Thank You Maria Gelnett MSTRnysegDOC CREDITnysegrDOC
NYSEG ISDA negotationWhat is your availability this week for a conference call with our Attorney Maria

NYSEGEnron ISDA Letter of Cc to your detailed letter on finalizing issues for the ISDA negotiation we have return comments on your numbers and only All other issues can be considered finalized Part h of Schedule Arbitration We would like to finalize this with litigation in Texas courts under NY law Part j of Schedule Transfer see attached redlined file for our proposed inserts See attached file Enronisda insertdoc If you would like to discuss these matters please contact me at or NYSEGs attorney Janine Huber at Maria Gelnett Enronisda insertdoc

Re ISDA Master Agreement with NYSEG Cc My Attorney and I have review the ISDA Schedule and CSA I am faxing it in liew of time with margin notes Please call to discuss Maria Susan Flynn on PM To Maria R YSEG cc Sara Shackleton Subject ISDA Master Agreement with NYSEG Attached for your review and comment is a draft ISDA Master Agreement We are reviewing your comments to the Enron Corp Gty and will get back to you later this week Please call either Sara Shackleton at or me at with your comments or questions See attached file ctrdoc ctrdoc
